metadata.title: Hairdresser Grooming Smock for Men and Women, Barber Jackets Apron for Dog Groomers, Salon Hair Stylist, Nail Tech-Grey
features: Grey Hairdresser Grooming Smock, L size- Bust 55"- Hip 50"- Total Length 37 "-Sleeve length 15.7".
Made from soft nylon material, Breathable, comfortable, Water-repellent, Anti-static, hair won’t stick to the material.
6 easy snap closures on the front, 3/4 Roll-up Sleeves with snap closure.
Two large front pockets, easy to put and classify the necessary tools.
Great for dog groomer, hair stylist, nail technician, esthetician, massage therapist. Protect your clothes from any spills.
